text: This was the first season of the Truck Series with Stanley Black & Decker as the series sponsor. Camping World, the title sponsor of the series from 2009 to 2022, did not renew their title sponsorship of the series. Zane Smith was the champion, returning to the Front Row Motorsports No. 38 truck full-time in 2023. ==References== Category:December 2023 events
title: 2023 NASCAR Craftsman Truck Series
